DocAttribute.Name: AppliedCondition
DocAttribute.Documentation: Optional boundary conditions which define support conditions of this connection object, given in local coordinate directions of the connection object. If left unspecified, the connection object is assumed to have no supports besides being connected with members.

DocAttribute.Name: ConnectsStructuralMembers
DocAttribute.Documentation: References to the IfcRelConnectsStructuralMembers relationship by which structural members can be associated to structural connections.
